findings.rationale: The absence of audit rights may limit the ability to verify compliance with confidentiality obligations, posing a risk to the Disclosing Party.
findings.evidence_quote: No audit rights are granted under this Agreement.

findings.rationale: The lack of intellectual property provisions may lead to ambiguity regarding ownership and usage rights of any intellectual property developed during the agreement.
The indemnification clause only states that it is 'required by law', which may create uncertainty about the extent and applicability of indemnification obligations.
findings.evidence_quote: The Receiving Party shall indemnify the Disclosing Party to the extent required by law for all claims arising from breach of this Agreement.
